JobTitle: Learning Delivery Partner -  Global Operations Learning
JobFullDesc: Every day, people come to Facebook to connect with friends and family, discover what's going on in the world, interact with businesses, find potential customers, and build community. Facebook’s Global Operations team exists to help them. The Learning Delivery Partner, Global Operations Learning role will work with our cross-functional teams on the delivery and program management of innovative learning and performance support solutions primarily for Global Operations employees.As an expert facilitator, they will gain knowledge and expertise, becoming the subject matter expert and primary point of contact for learning related to our internal Global Operations programs. They will represent the learning needs, identify, gather and validate learning requirements and collaborate with other internal teams to address learning gaps.
